properties.displayName: User Account Creation followed by User Login followed by User Account Deletion in short timeframe (CEF)
properties.description: User Account Creation followed by User Login followed by User Account Deletion in short timeframe
properties.query:
let timeframe = 15m;
let lookback = 24h;
let account_created =
CommonSecurityLog 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(lookback+timeframe)
| where DeviceEventClassID == "1000" // A user account was created
| project creationTime = TimeGenerated, CreateEventID = DeviceEventClassID, Activity, Computer, 
  DestinationUserName, DestinationUserPrivileges, AccountUsedToCreate = SourceUserName, SourceUserID, 
  DestinationUserID;
let account_deleted =
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeframe) 
| where DeviceEventClassID == "1001" // A user account was deleted 
| project deletionTime = TimeGenerated, DeleteEventID = DeviceEventClassID, Activity, Computer, 
  DestinationUserName, DestinationUserPrivileges, AccountUsedToDelete = SourceUserName, SourceUserID, 
  DestinationUserID;
let account_create_delete=  
account_created
| join kind= inner (account_deleted) on Computer, DestinationUserName
| where deletionTime  - creationTime < lookback
| where tolong(deletionTime - creationTime) > 0
| project TimeDelta = deletionTime - creationTime, creationTime, CreateEventID, Computer, DestinationUserName, DestinationUserID, AccountUsedToCreate, 
deletionTime, DeleteEventID, AccountUsedToDelete
| extend timestamp = creationTime, AccountCustomEntity = AccountUsedToCreate, HostCustomEntity = Computer;
let account_login =
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeframe) 
| where DeviceEventClassID == "1005" // A user account was login 
| project loginTime = TimeGenerated, LoginEventID = DeviceEventClassID, Activity, Computer, 
  DestinationUserName, DestinationUserPrivileges, AccountUsedToCreate = SourceUserName, SourceUserID, 
  DestinationUserID;
account_create_delete
| join kind= inner (account_login) on Computer, DestinationUserName
| where loginTime  - creationTime < lookback
| where tolong(loginTime - creationTime) > 0
| project TimeDelta = deletionTime - creationTime, creationTime, loginTime,deletionTime, Computer, DestinationUserName, DestinationUserID, AccountUsedToCreate,CreateEventID,LoginEventID, DeleteEventID, AccountUsedToDelete
| extend timestamp = creationTime, AccountCustomEntity = AccountUsedToCreate, HostCustomEntity = Computer;
